participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and passionate about art, enjoys exploring new hobbies.
participant_1.background: I work in a corner grocery store during the day. I like dr pepper and black jack gum, but not together. In the evenings I watch the door at a club where they play punk rock. My favorite show is Scooby Doo. I draw comic books.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Artistic and thoughtful, enjoys painting and deep conversations about creativity.
participant_2.background: I live with my boyfriend of 5 years. I paint in my free time. I work in IT. I was born in London. I live in Vienna, Austria now.

content.text: What do you do for work?
I'm a painter.
Oh, that's cool! I've always wanted to learn how to paint.
It's a lot of fun. What do you like to draw?
I like to draw comics. I'm actually working on a graphic novel right now.
Oh, that's awesome! I'd love to see it when it's done.
Sure, I'll send you a link when it's finished.
Thanks!
What kind of things do you like to paint?
I like to paint landscapes and portraits. I also like to do abstract art.
Oh, that's cool. I've always been more of a figurative artist.
I think it's important to try different things. You never know what you might like.
I agree. I've been trying to get into more abstract art lately.
That's great! I hope you enjoy it.
Thanks.
So, what's your favorite thing about living in Vienna?
I love the food! The schnitzel is amazing.
I love the schnitzel too! I also love the coffee.
The coffee is great! I love going to coffee shops and just people-watching.
That sounds like a great way to spend an afternoon.
It is! I usually go to a cafe near my apartment and just sit there for hours, reading a book and drinking coffee.
That sounds like my kind of afternoon.
It's the perfect way to relax after a long day.
